rows: C:\Users\SomeUserName\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk\platform-tools, whereSomeUserNameis the username of your Windows user account.
html:
Variable name

Variable description

Variable value

PATH

The path to the adb.exe installation file.

C:\Users\SomeUserName\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk\platform-tools, where SomeUserName is the username of your Windows user account.
